file_content.text: Blizz like new job! Give Blizz lot of new ideas!
You no friend of Blizz. Go away!
New friend get scary dragon-man?
New friend be careful. Lots of White Maw in big dreadnaught.
Now that mean horn-head man gone, Blizz bet boss Vause think twice about new friend now.
Only big captain left is big rival. There no way Vause not fight if new friend beat up chief rival.
Who am I after now, Blizz?
Who's his rival?
Big one-eye man, Ki-Ta Kren.
If this guy's such a big deal, why didn't I just start with him?
Why didn't we do this, first?
Well, because... um... others on the way? New friend want big Jagga score anyway. Ki-Ta Kren make Jagga score huge!
Last one, Blizz. I'm only getting paid one bounty.
I'm tired of these sidelines.
If scary dragon-man still not fight after new friend beat up Ki-Ta Kren, Blizz not know what get boss Vause interest.
Boss Kren big tribe chief from Byss. Always brag he "survive more Bloodings than human have years."
When big one-eye come join White Maw, he get into boasting match with boss Vause. They get in big fight, huge!
I only need to know his location, Blizz.
Just tell me where I find him.
I'll bet Vause'd rather shoot than shout.
I'm guessing it got ugly.
Boss Vause jump on boss Kren with tooth and claw. Boss Kren laugh at wounds, say they not last through night.
Make Vause super angry! Almost tear boss Kren throat out with teeth and yell that he just feast on creature until nothing left!
It go on like that long long time until both lie in pool of own blood. They be friends ever since. Blizz not really understand.
If he's got an axe to grind, he might be willing to help take down the Trandoshan.
Can I use him against Vause?
That only time one-eye and dragon-man ever fight. It go on long time, end when both lie in pool of own blood.
They be friends ever since. Blizz not really understand.
Taking out a friend of his should bring him running. Where do I find him?
Okay, time to make Vause mad.
Same as what we're doing--they earned each other's respect.
I understand it.
Oh... Blizz think that make sense, kinda.
Quitters. I'll show them how to finish what they start.
I'll tear them apart.
Blizz hope new friend right. Boss Kren super tough... big fight with boss Vause only keep him in medbay one day.
Boss Kren taskmaster for fixing big superdreadnaught in heart of starship graveyard.
New friend fight Kren, then take comm codes and call Vause from dreadnaught. Big comm array there. Super strong, reach boss Vause for sure. Then Vause fight.
I'll chat with Vause as soon as I'm done with Kren.
Get codes, call Vause. Got it.
You've been a big help, little guy.
Thanks, Blizz.
Next time you see me, I'll be dragging a lizard carcass.
Good as done.
New friend been gone long time, Blizz want to check in.
Your little admirer's pretty resourceful. I've been trying to get something other than static for hours now.
I thought comm traffic was impossible out here?
Blizz? I'm getting nothing but dead air on my link. How do you have a working comm?
Blizz have hard time finding new friend frequency. Been down in rock-river?
I was on my way back.
Just finished there.
Why do you have a comlink and how is it even functional?
How'd you get a working comm?
How'd you guess?
What do you think, idiot?
Blizz picking up all sort of frequency, just not new friend. Blizz figure new friend far under white sands.
Blizz wire into blue funny alien man network, but it all fuzzy, so Blizz make few adjustments. All better now.
Beat up mean horn-head man real good!
Rock-river very hot, so boss Gradak and other horn-heads run smelting. Only ones that not need tech for heat and smoke.
Most work done by prisoners though, 'cause boss Gradak think they not much loss when tech fail.
What's so special about Gradak that the Trandoshan would care if I kill him?
Tell me more about my target.
Blizz hear rumor say boss Gradak was big Republic soldier in last war. After war, deserted. Become raider to take, take, take.
Nice guy. Time to show him what a real loss looks like.
He won't get away with that.
Boss Gradak big time greedy. Become raider to take, take, take. Treasure, slaves, even ships!
Crews say Republic send ships to stop boss Gradak, but horn-head man take fight to them and steal whole fleet!
Freed prisoners could make a decent distraction.
Would the slaves rebel?
Maybe. All soldiers from fights with White Maw. Blizz think they want payback.
Boss Gradak was one who push Empire and Republic out of White Maw territory. That earn him place as big captain.
I'm good when you are, Blizz.
I've heard enough.
He's not gonna have an army when I find him.
I'll show him a real fight.
Blizz sure new friend beat up horn-head real good.
He should've stayed a nobody.
And a place on my hit list.
Blizz finished now. Output not great and it not last forever, but this last until new friend find real thermal shield at smelting plant, Blizz think....
Better to hurry, not take chance. Blizz like new friend, Blizz not want new friend to get cooked.
I brought the tech you asked for.
Yay! Good, good. Give here, Blizz have look.
Slam asked me to bring you this.
Gift from Slam...? Blizz old stuff! Blizz thank new friend and Slam.
Aww... this all that left of Blizz things.... Stupid Jreely! Blizz get Jreely back someday!
What's this heat resistor for anyway?
Why'd you want this heat gear?
Could be worse, you could have been left with nothing at all.
Look on the bright side.
New friend right, Blizz thankful for Slam and new friend getting things back with other tech.
I'm not here to listen to you whine.
Shut up and stay focused.
Sorry, sorry. Blizz look at heat resistor now....
New friend need heat resistor to get next big captain, Gradak Ungan. Gradak boss of White Maw smelting. Have big plant set up around underground rock-river.
Hmm. Heat resistor not strong enough to protect from rock-river. Blizz work to boost output.
What are you getting me into, Blizz?
Care to fill me in?
What's a rock-river?
Rock-river?
Umm... it hot... and glowy... and umm, runny.... Oh! Like when sand get under flame-torch while welding!
This just keep getting better.
It be okay. New friend have Blizz help, get job done soon.
Find old boss Slam. Slam help new friend beat up creepy three-eye.
Closest big captain be creepy three-eye droid-man. Ayor-v9 big boss of hot-tunnel power plant. Not far from here.
Know anything to help me deal with Ayor?
Tell me about Ayor-v9.
It's as good a lead as any.
He not like people much, only droids. Ayor-v9 have laser-brain, talk to droid-friends all the time. Have many many droid-friends.
Can you run that by me in Basic this time?
Uh, "droid-man"?
Ayor-v9 have laser-brain to talk to droid-friends all the time. Have many many droid-friends.
Droid-man have other parts inside too, make him tough, but big thing be deflector shield. Come off star-fighter, super strong!
New friend be okay though. Blizz know how to take things apart, even three-eye droid-man.
What have you got in mind, Blizz?
How can you help me?
Never met a Jawa who couldn't turn tech to scrap in ten seconds flat.
I bet.
Blizz turn scrap to tech ten seconds flat, too!
Your plan better work, runt.
Blizz can help, Blizz promise.
Blizz recalibrate blaster, make output super ion blast! Zap! Big sparks! Droids and droid-man go boom! Not work so good on people, though.
Blizz old salvage crew bring parts for work on hot-tunnel. Find old boss Slam Streever, Blizz sure Slam help new friend of Blizz.
Tell Slam get three-phase field frequency tuner from Blizz stash, also need heat resistor from plant.
Slam Streever. Field tuner. Heat resistor. Got it.
Understood.
I'm going to need a heat resistor... on Hoth?
A heat resistor? You kidding?
Blizz explain later. You worry about droid-man now.
Why do I need all this junk?
Need tuner to short out Ayor-v9 deflector shield. Point, push big red button, droid-man shield reboot. Simple, you see.
New friend tell Slam, Blizz okay. Beat up creepy three-eye good!
Vause took off. Let his cronies do the dying. Said I wasn't worthy.
No fight...? Jagga this. Jagga that. All Vause talk about! Blizz not understand....
Blizz got it! Boss Vause think you not worth Jagga points. Waste of time.
Blizz think if new friend beat up other big captains, boss Vause think new friend worth big Jagga. He come to you!
Slow down. What do you mean by "Jagga points"?
Jagga points?
He means Jagganath points. Hunting is a religion to Trandoshans. Their goddess gives them Jagganath for successful hunts.
It's serious business to them. A Trandoshan's score determines his place in the afterlife.
Boss Vause have game he play, get Jagga points from Scorekeeper for big fight. Boss Vause play all the time. Have big score!
Boss Vause not think much of others, only other big captains in White Maw. Blizz guess they have good scores.
I'll track Vause down the old fashion way.
I've heard enough, goodbye.
Boss Vause never stay one place long, only come to camp when he want something. You not find him by chasing.
Do me a favor. Don't think.
You're an idiot.
Listen, listen! Boss Vause always out hunting. You not find him by chasing. Better he come to you!
Other big captains easier to find than boss Vause. Have jobs, stay one place. You see.
New friend not find cave? It not far. Blizz promise!
New person come to talk to Blizz? Blue-man only come to spray Blizz with hose.
Recalibration last until power pack run out, long enough to beat up Ayor-v9 Blizz think. Want Blizz to work on blaster?
Just don't break it.
Blizz know what Blizz doing. Make ion gun in sleep.
Anything to get this over with faster.
A little edge couldn't hurt.
You like, Blizz promise. Droid-man not stand chance against Blizz gun.
If I want to wreck it, I'll just toss it in an ion drive.
You ain't touching my blaster.
Hmph. Blizz not make junk. Don't ask for Blizz help when droid-man laugh at factory blaster.
Blizz take good care of blaster, all ready! Zap creepy three-eye good! New friend tell Slam Blizz okay, okay?
Two. One for new friend, one for friend of new friend. Blizz explain later. You worry about droid-man now.
